answers.criteria: UPPER(customerid) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', UPPER(?)), '%') OR UPPER(companyname) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', UPPER(?)), '%') OR upper(contactname) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', UPPER(?)), '%') OR upper(contacttitle) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', UPPER(?)), '%') OR upper(address) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', UPPER(?)), '%') OR upper(city) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', UPPER(?)), '%') OR upper(region) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', UPPER(?)), '%') OR postalcode LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', ?), '%') OR upper(country) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', UPPER(?)), '%') OR phone LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', ?), '%') OR fax LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', ?), '%')

answers.sql:
SELECT 
    o.*,
    s.COMPANYNAME as shipper,
    COUNT(od.PRODUCTID) AS lines,
    SUM((od.UNITPRICE * od.QUANTITY) * (1 - od.DISCOUNT)) AS total
FROM 
    ORDERS o
JOIN 
    ORDERDETAILS od ON o.ORDERID = od.ORDERID
JOIN 
    SHIPPERS s ON o.SHIPVIA = s.SHIPPERID
WHERE 
    o.CUSTOMERID = ?
    
GROUP BY 
    o.ORDERID, 
    o.CUSTOMERID, 
    o.EMPLOYEEID, 
    o.ORDERDATE, 
    o.REQUIREDDATE, 
    o.SHIPPEDDATE, 
    o.SHIPVIA, 
    o.FREIGHT, 
    o.SHIPNAME, 
    o.SHIPADDRESS, 
    o.SHIPCITY, 
    o.SHIPREGION, 
    o.SHIPPOSTALCODE, 
    o.SHIPCOUNTRY,
    s.COMPANYNAME
ORDER BY 
    o.ORDERID;

SELECT 
    o.OrderID as orderid,
    o.CustomerID as customerid,
    o.EmployeeID as employeeid,
    o.OrderDate as orderdate,
    o.RequiredDate as requireddate,
    o.ShippedDate as shippeddate,
    o.ShipVia as shivia,
    o.Freight as freight,
    o.ShipName as shipname,
    o.ShipAddress as shipaddress,
    o.ShipCity as shipcity,
    o.ShipRegion as shipregion,
    o.ShipPostalCode as shippostalcode,
    o.ShipCountry as shipcounty,
    s.COMPANYNAME as shipper,
    COUNT(od.PRODUCTID) AS lines,
    SUM((od.UNITPRICE * od.QUANTITY) * (1 - od.DISCOUNT)) AS total
FROM 
    ORDERS o
JOIN 
    ORDERDETAILS od ON o.ORDERID = od.ORDERID
JOIN 
    SHIPPERS s ON o.SHIPVIA = s.SHIPPERID
WHERE 
    o.CUSTOMERID = ?
    
GROUP BY 
    o.ORDERID, 
    o.CUSTOMERID, 
    o.EMPLOYEEID, 
    o.ORDERDATE, 
    o.REQUIREDDATE, 
    o.SHIPPEDDATE, 
    o.SHIPVIA, 
    o.FREIGHT, 
    o.SHIPNAME, 
    o.SHIPADDRESS, 
    o.SHIPCITY, 
    o.SHIPREGION, 
    o.SHIPPOSTALCODE, 
    o.SHIPCOUNTRY,
    s.COMPANYNAME
ORDER BY 
    o.ORDERID;

SELECT 
    o.ORDERID as orderid,
    o.CUSTOMERID as customerid,
    o.EMPLOYEEID as employeeid,
    o.ORDERDATE as orderdate,
    o.REQUIREDDATE as requiredate,
    o.SHIPPEDDATE as shippeddate,
    o.SHIPVIA as shipvia,
    o.FREIGHT as freight,
    o.SHIPNAME as shipname,
    o.SHIPADDRESS as shipaddress,
    o.SHIPCITY as shipcity,
    o.SHIPREGION as shipregion,
    o.SHIPPOSTALCODE as shippostalcode,
    o.SHIPCOUNTRY as shipcountry,
    od.PRODUCTID as productid,
    p.PRODUCTNAME as productname,
    p.CATEGORYID as categoryid,
    c.CATEGORYNAME as categoryname,
    od.UNITPRICE as unitprice,
    od.QUANTITY as quantity,
    (od.DISCOUNT * 100) as discount,
    (od.UNITPRICE * od.QUANTITY * (1 - od.DISCOUNT)) AS extended,
    s.COMPANYNAME AS shippername,
    s.PHONE AS shipperphone,
    p.UNITSINSTOCK as unitsinstock,
    p.UNITSONORDER as unitsonorder
FROM 
    ORDERS o
INNER JOIN 
    ORDERDETAILS od ON o.ORDERID = od.ORDERID
INNER JOIN 
    PRODUCTS p ON od.PRODUCTID = p.PRODUCTID
INNER JOIN 
    SHIPPERS s ON o.SHIPVIA = s.SHIPPERID
LEFT JOIN 
    CATEGORIES c ON p.CATEGORYID = c.CATEGORYID
WHERE 
    o.CUSTOMERID = ? AND
    o.ORDERID = ?       
ORDER BY  
    o.ORDERID, od.PRODUCTID;

items.column headings: Order #,Order Date,Ship To Address,# Lines,Order Total,Freight
